remarks: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same limit.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Nov-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
statement:
climeq.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climeq.2 $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
climeq.3 $e |- ( ph -> G e. W ) $.
climeq.5 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climeq.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = ( G ` k ) ) $.
climeq $p |- ( ph -> ( F ~~> A <-> G ~~> A ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
